question: The runner-up in The Celebrity Apprentice 2 has written an autobiography titled what?
gold_answer: "How I Raised, Folded, Bluffed, Flirted, Cursed, and Won Millions at the World Series of Poker"
llm_answer: Annie Duke: How I Raised, Folded, Bluffed, Flirted, Cursed, and Won Millions at the World Series of Poker

scores.explanation: The Model Answer correctly identifies the autobiography title as 'Annie Duke: How I Raised, Folded, Bluffed, Flirted, Cursed, and Won Millions at the World Series of Poker,' which matches the Gold Answer. The retrieved context explicitly supports this information, confirming the title and its publication details. All key facts from the Gold Answer are included in the Model Answer.
